item.title: Advancing seniority means doing the job before you are recognized for it
item.description: Advancing seniority means doing the job before you’re recognized for it Concept Description Upstream Concepts which directly led to this

item.title: Atomic Habits for High Performance
item.description: Atomic Habits for High Performance Concept Description More detail on this subject can be found in the book [[Atomic Habits]] by [[James Clear]]

item.title: Characteristics of Good Managers
item.description: Characteristics of Good Managers Concept Description Managers have different job functions than individual contributors, but the job isn’t just about the functions.

item.title: Climb the Individual Contributor seniority ladder or go somewhere where you can
item.description: Climb the Individual Contributor seniority ladder or go somewhere where you can Concept Description In many cases, individual contributors consider a management career because they view it as the only way to progress in their careers.

item.title: Curse of Knowledge
item.description: Curse of Knowledge Concept Description The idea that people who know information deeply might not be the best teachers of that information, as they’ve lost connection with being a beginner.

item.title: Deep Work for High Performance
item.description: Deep Work for High Performance Concept Description More detail on this subject can be found in the book [[Deep Work]] by [[Cal Newport]].

item.title: Leading without managing
item.description: Leading without managing Concept Description While leadership and managmenet are terms that often get used interchangably, they’re not the same thing.

item.title: Managers do different work than the teams they manage
item.description: Managers do different work than the teams they manage Concept Description Managers of teams have a job that is almost completely different from the teams they manage, requiring very different skills.

item.title: Show Your Work for High Performance
item.description: Show Your Work for High Performance Concept Description More detail on this subject can be found in the book [[Show Your Work!

item.title: Smart Notes for High Performance
item.description: Smart Notes for High Performance Concept Description More detail on this idea in the books [[How to Take Smart Notes]] by [[Sonke Ahrens]] and [[How to Take Smart Notes in Obsidian]] by [[Josh Duffney]]

item.title: Writing the Nerd Journey Session for VMware Explore 2022
item.description: Writing the Nerd Journey Session for VMware Explore 2022 Beginning With the End We had a well-attended session at VMware Explore 2022.
